name: DeviceIdentifierSkillforAlexa
0:
”Alexa, open device identifier”
”Alexa, ask device identifier device name”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: device identifier
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Alexa Device Identifier skill simplifies your interaction with multiple Echo devices. By enabling this skill, you can immediately find out which Echo you are speaking to with a simple voice command. It’s ideal for users who utilize several Echo devices across different locations in their home or office.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
